entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 04:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
